Inasmuch, then, as we are holy by baptism, we ought to lead a life holy and adorned with virtues.

Wherefore that internal operation of the Holy Spirit, in which all true Christians participate, requires the same from them even as it were in its own right. For the opera- tion of the Spirit brings new life; new life brings new strength3 and these require new manners and actions.
